  • Uses of User in data

    Methods in data that return User
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static User
    UserDatabase.getUserById(String nric, AuthenticationController ac)
    Retrieves a user by their NRIC, and returns a user instance based on their role (Applicant, Officer, Manager).

  • Uses of User in entities

    Subclasses of User in entities
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Applicant
    Represents an Applicant in the system.
    class 
    Manager
    Represents a Manager who is responsible for managing projects, approving or rejecting applications, and handling enquiries in the system.
    class 
    Officer
    The Officer class represents a user with officer privileges who can manage and register for HDB projects.
    Methods in entities that return User
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    User.changePassword(String newPassword, UserDatabase db)
    Changes the user's password and updates it in the user database.
    User
    User.logout()
    Logs the user out and changes the login status to false.

    void
    OfficerActionHandler.handleProjectApplicantAction(int choice, User currentUser, Scanner sc)
    Handles actions related to projects that applicants can perform, such as viewing projects, applying for projects, and managing their applications.
    void
    OfficerActionHandler.handleProjectOfficerAction(int choice, User currentUser, Scanner sc)
    Handles actions related to projects that officers can perform, such as viewing and managing project applications, booking flats, and generating receipts.
